official-title.#text:
To amend the Defense Base Act to require the provision of
		  insurance under that Act under a Government self-insurance program, and to
		  require an implementation strategy for such self-insurance
		  program.

committee-name.#tail:
,
			 and in addition to the Committee on
committee-name.#text: Committee on Education and the Workforce

committee-name.#tail:
, for a period to be subsequently determined by the
			 Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the
			 jurisdiction of the committee concerned

) introduced the

compensation and

compensation and

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
Defense Base Act Insurance Improvement Act of
				2013
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Defense Base Act Insurance Improvement Act of 2013

text.#text:
The effective date of this subsection is the date occurring
				one year after the date of the enactment of the

header.#text:
Implementation
			 strategy for Government Defense Base Act self-insurance program

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall jointly develop and execute an implementation strategy for a
			 self-insurance program for insurance required by the

text.#text: The

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall address and provide a plan for the following:
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Defense Base Act Insurance Improvement Act of 2013/s:3/ss:a

text.#text: The implementation strategy required under

Appropriate administration of the
			 self-insurance program, including appropriate program financing.

Appropriate procedures for claims
			 processing, claims adjudication, and benefits delivery, taking into
			 consideration the unique circumstances of insuring overseas contractors.

A
			 timeline and strategy to transfer existing claims covered under the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
by private carriers to a Government self-insurance
			 program.

text.#text:
Recommendations
			 for any additional statutory revisions necessary to carry out the
			 strategy.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall jointly
			 prepare and submit to the appropriate congressional committees a report on the
			 implementation strategy.

text.#text:
Not later than 180 days after the date of the enactment
			 of this Act, the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall jointly prepare a report on the implementation of
			 this Act and the amendment made by this Act.

text.#text:
Not later than 2
			 years after the date of the enactment of this Act, the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
self-insurance program (as defined
			 in the amendment made by

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Defense Base Act Insurance Improvement Act of 2013/s:2

text.#text:
The report shall cover, at a minimum, the following with
			 respect to the

The cost savings
			 from the use of the self-insurance program.

The quality of
			 administration of the self-insurance program.

Whether the
			 delivery of benefits to injured employees and their survivors (in the case of
			 death) has improved under the self-insurance program.

Recommendations for improvement of the
			 self-insurance program.

Such other matters
			 as the Secretaries consider appropriate.
